scripts.prebuild: node -e "const c=require('child_process'); const has=(m)=>{ try{ require.resolve(m); return true; } catch(e){ return false; } }; const skip=process.env.SKIP_QUALITY_CHECK==='1'; const isProd=process.env.NODE_ENV==='production'; if(skip){ console.warn('[prebuild] SKIP_QUALITY_CHECK=1, skipping quality checks'); process.exit(0); } if(isProd && (!has('eslint') || !has('eslint-plugin-react-hooks'))){ console.warn('[prebuild] Dev dependencies missing in production, skipping quality checks'); process.exit(0); } c.execSync('npm run quality:check',{stdio:'inherit'}); "
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.quality:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run typecheck
scripts.dev:quality: concurrently -k -n dev,lint,types -c auto "npm run dev" "npm run lint:watch" "npm run typecheck:watch"
scripts.security:react2shell:scan: node -e "const c=require('child_process'); const pkgs=['react-server-dom-webpack','react-server-dom-parcel','react-server-dom-turbopack','@vitejs/plugin-rsc','@parcel/rsc']; let bad=[]; for (const p of pkgs){ try{ const out=c.execSync('npm ls '+p+' --json',{stdio:'pipe'}).toString(); const data=JSON.parse(out); const dep=data.dependencies && data.dependencies[p]; if (dep && dep.version){ const v=dep.version; const vuln=new Set(['19.0.0','19.1.0','19.1.1','19.2.0']); if ((p.startsWith('react-server-dom') && vuln.has(v)) || p==='@vitejs/plugin-rsc' || p==='@parcel/rsc'){ bad.push(p+'@'+v);} } } catch(e){} } if (bad.length){ console.error('React2Shell exposure detected: '+bad.join(', ')); process.exit(1);} else { console.log('No React2Shell exposure detected'); }"
